name: Scope Creep
description:
For webGL please use fullscreen!

Reach the goal.

Now do it without power-ups.

This game was made as part of the ludum dare 45.

THEME: Start with nothing

This has taken appx.  27h to make and is the result of scope creep and binning other projects as well.

I am not particularly proud of this as there were still more things left to do, such as music, better graphics, sfx, particles, and adding destructible objects for the secret routes. Even so for the amount of time spent restarting from scratch it's a decent game. And I feel that it incorporates the there very well, as in I had to start again and again with nothing while making this :))
